title: United Pacific 46151 Competition Series 3 Trumpet Train Horn, Heavy-Duty Electric Solenoid, 150 PSI Max, Super Loud Output 150dB +/- 10 dB - ONE Set
features: WHAT’S IN THE BOX: Included in the order is the following: (ONE) United Pacific Competition Series 3 Trumpet Train Horn. (NOTE: ONLY ONE unit (3 Trumpet on a single bracket) will be shipped).

FEATURES: The United Pacific Competition Series 3 Trumpet Train Horn features 3 individual horns mounted on a single solid bracket. Compared to our original train horn, these are constructed to be more durable and slightly thicker and bigger for the higher sound output. Included with the train horn are the mounting pad and bolts for installation. It measures approximately: 15-1/2" L x 11-3/4" W x 11-1/2" H.

INFO & SOUND OUTPUT: Our United Pacific Competition Series 3 Trumpet Train Horn is built to be tough and durable. The 12-volt heavy duty electric air solenoid which is included has a max air pressure of 150 PSI. The train horn has a super loud output of 150 dB +/- 10 dB.

WHO WE ARE: We are unique individuals whose varied talents and experiences bring value to the way we connect with big rig drivers and car enthusiasts, and the world. With over 30 years of experience, we’re dedicated to the design, manufacturing and supply of automotive products for heavy-duty trucks and classic cars.

UNITED PACIFIC: United Pacific has a large library of aftermarket parts and accessories from our classic car department to our trucking department. We strive to be the best and offer the best at the best cost! We take pride in our work and products, and it takes countless hours to create the best products out there! Our team is dedicated to providing you with the answers you need when ordering our products.
